titles.title: How Lovely is your dwelling place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How lovely is Thy dwelling place, O Lord my God
My heart longs, longs and faints for Thy courts
And I would rather be a doorkeeper in Thy house
Than to live all my life somewhere else.
You are my sun, You are my shield
You are my lover from the start
And the highway to Thy city
Runs through my heart.
